snippet.title: Overwatch Animated Short | "Infiltration"
snippet.description:
Hack your way into Overwatch's sixth animated short: Infiltration! Then begin your watch on PC, PlayStation 4, or Xbox One: http://www.buyoverwatch.com

"Infiltration" follows Reaper, Widowmaker, and Sombra as they attempt to assassinate a high-priority target. But, when the operation doesn't go as planned, the Talon agents are forced to improvise... 

Learn more about Sombra: http://blizz.ly/Sombra

Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoverwatch
